attributes.action: Let the Chagos Islanders return to their homeland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The governments SECRET DEAL WITH AMERICA to rob the islanders of their homes and force them to relocate to other countries was a rotten thing to do. To continue to rob them of their homeland now just for the sake of yet another US MILITARY BASE is appalling. The treatment of these people in this day and age makes me even more ashamed to be british.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
